contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of November, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted, the order of the Superior Court is reversed, the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is vacated, and the matter is remanded to the common pleas court for further proceedings consistent ■with Cheeseman v. Lethal Exterminator, Inc. and Forman v. Rossman, 701 A.2d 156 (Pa.1997).
